backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, test attempts, course progress, news caching, and access control with role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing their functionality and recent changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for theming, including light/dark mode color tokens and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entrypoint loading fonts, setting metadata, and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router configuration defining all routes and installing an OpenAI request blocker at startup.
frontend/src/components/friendChat/ChatG: Alert component explaining built‑in on-device chat assistant behavior and power mode status.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsItemRow: News item row component showing a headline, preview, and per-item TTS play/stop controls with error handling.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSection: Renders region-specific news with loading, error, empty, and populated states using a news hook.
frontend/src/components/news/TopUSHeadli: Fetches and displays top US headlines with parsing, loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/proInterviewer/B: Provides a floating microphone toggle button with visual listening indicators.
frontend/src/components/test/ResultEffec: Shows a full-screen confetti animation when enabled using a canvas animation loop.
frontend/src/config/newsDataSource.ts: Configuration for switching between demo and backend news data sources.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAiMode.ts: Determines whether AI mode should be used based on key validity and tracks connection errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourseProgress.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating user profile and course progress via backend actor APIs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalSettings.ts: React hook that loads and updates browser‑local API keys and settings with storage sync.
frontend/src/hooks/usePowerMode.ts: Manages a locally stored OpenAI key, validates its format, and exposes Power Mode state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides react‑query hooks for fetching and refreshing backend region news, mainly India.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionNews.ts: Fetches, parses, and caches region news with demo‑mode overrides and timestamps, plus a bulk refetch helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements browser‑only speech recognition using the Web Speech API with transcript and error callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUSNews.ts: React‑query hooks for fetching and refreshing general US news through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS config defining color variables, typography, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1LessonConten: Static lesson content for day 1 covering grammar basics, vocabulary, essay guidance, and a short reading passage.
frontend/src/lib/course/day1TestQuestion: Exports multiple‑choice test questions for day 1 focused on basic English grammar.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayGrammarChec: Runs each essay line through detectAndCorrect and returns error counts plus formatted correction entries.
frontend/src/lib/course/essayPowerModeFe: Generates enhanced grammar corrections, structural suggestions, and an overall score for essay lines.
frontend/src/lib/friendChat/types.ts: Defines the ChatMessage interface for user and tutor messages with metadata.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/analyzeUser: Analyzes grammar, tone, vocabulary, and power-answer opportunities for a user message.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/detectAndCo: Applies regex‑based grammar rules to detect and auto-correct common English mistakes.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generatePow: Generates detailed Power Mode tutor replies with safety checks and context-based responses.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/generateTut: Creates normal tutor replies with safety filtering and optional analysis-based tips.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/powerAnswer: Detects simple phrases and provides stronger alternative expressions for power‑up suggestions.
frontend/src/lib/friendTutor/progressRep: Tracks session stats and generates a formatted progress report summarizing improvements.
frontend/src/lib/news/demoNewsData.ts: Defines static demo news items for several regions with headlines and previews.
frontend/src/lib/news/parseNews.ts: Parses GNews JSON into cleaned NewsItem objects and handles errors or empty responses.
frontend/src/lib/news/regionConfig.ts: Provides region metadata including IDs, names, and flag icons.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/powerModeStor: Implements localStorage helpers for saving, retrieving, and clearing the OpenAI API key.
frontend/src/lib/powerMode/validateOpenA: Validates OpenAI API key format, ensuring non-empty keys start with 'sk-'.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/coachAns: Generates coaching feedback for interview answers including grammar correction, pronunciation hints, and pro tips.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/document: Defines interfaces for uploaded documents, extraction results, interview data, feedback, and metrics utilities.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/extractT: Stubbed image OCR function that returns failure due to missing OCR library.
Attempts basic PDF text extraction using FileReader and fallback messaging when extraction is insufficient.
Computes answer metrics such as sentence stats and filler counts and aggregates them across answers.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/question: Builds interview questions from extracted document data, manual notes, and optional DAF mode rules.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/sessionR: Generates a session report by scoring logic, clarity, grammar, and filler usage, and builds narrative feedback and improvement areas.
frontend/src/lib/proInterviewer/summariz: Extracts keywords, skills, education, roles, and achievement indicators from text using simple pattern matching.
frontend/src/lib/security/blockOpenAIReq: Implements runtime guards that block fetch/XHR requests to OpenAI domains and prevent unauthorized API key use.
frontend/src/lib/security/noOpenAIPolicy: Defines a policy disallowing OpenAI integration and lists permitted client-side alternatives.
frontend/src/lib/settings/localSettingsS: Manages storing, retrieving, and clearing app settings in browser localStorage, including API keys and links.
frontend/src/lib/settings/validateKeys.t: Validates format of OpenAI and Gemini API keys using basic length and pattern checks.
frontend/src/lib/tts/speakText.ts: Provides text‑to‑speech utilities with voice selection, cleanup, and error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoonPage.tsx: Renders a generic 'Coming Soon' page with feature name and navigation back home.
frontend/src/pages/Day1LearningHubPage.t: Displays Day 1 course content including grammar, vocabulary, and essay material with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Day1TestPage.tsx: Renders a 200‑question Day 1 test with navigation, scoring, visual effects, and score submission to backend.
frontend/src/pages/FriendChatPage.tsx: Provides a chat interface with an AI friend using text or speech input and generates offline tutor replies.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main navigation hub with cards linking to news, chat, course, tests, progress, and interview tools.
frontend/src/pages/MyProgressPage.tsx: Shows user authentication gate and a 60‑day progress dashboard including completed and unlocked days.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays regional news sections with optional demo mode and supports manual refresh.
Implements a multi‑step AI interview simulator with document upload, text extraction, question generation, speech input, and session reporting.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: React settings page allowing users to configure and locally store API keys and external links with UI cards and alerts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read, persist, and clear URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking current features, known issues, and redesign requirements for the UPSC prep app.
